description: Extracts IP addresses, URIs, domains from an email message and creates related artifacts.

inputs.description: The ID of the vault containing the email.
inputs.name: vault_id

inputs.description: The identifier of the container to which the artifacts will be added.
inputs.name: container_id

inputs.description: The severity level of the new artifact. This parameter is optional and defaults to "Medium". Acceptable values are "High", "Medium", or "Low".
inputs.name: severity

inputs.description: A boolean value ("true" or "false") indicating whether the new artifact should trigger the execution of any active playbooks associated with the container label. This parameter is optional and defaults to "false".
inputs.name: run_automation

inputs.description: A boolean value ("true" or "false") indicating whether to extract IP addresses. This parameter is optional and defaults to "true".
inputs.name: extract_ip

inputs.description: A boolean value ("true" or "false") indicating whether to extract URIs. This parameter is optional and defaults to "true".
inputs.name: extract_uri

inputs.description: A boolean value ("true" or "false") indicating whether to decode safelinks. This parameter is optional and defaults to "true".
inputs.name: decode_safelinks

inputs.description: A boolean value ("true" or "false") indicating whether to extract domains from URIs. This parameter is optional and defaults to "true".
inputs.name: extract_domain
